billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Requires the inclusion of certain information in fiscal notes in retirement bills and on bills affecting political subdivisions
summary: Requires the inclusion of certain information in fiscal notes in retirement bills and on bills affecting political subdivisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring the inclusion of certain information in fiscal notes in retirement bills and on bills affecting political subdivisions
